name: Super Block World Demo
description:
Super Block World is a puzzle-platformer in the style of the classic ZX81.

This is a demo version created in seventy-two hours for the Lost Cartridge Game Jam of 2021.

There are currently six levels.

Solo developer and no third-party assets used.

All graphics were created using the limited 128 character set for the ZX81 as the ZX81 was not capable of graphics beyond this (with the exception of hi-res mode). There is no sound or music due to the ZX81 not having a sound chip or speaker. This was also created in the native screen resolution of 256x192 (resized to fill the screen). 

Goal:

The goal is to get the key to the locked door to progress to the next level. When you grab the key, you have a limited amount of time before it disappears and respawns where it started. The key will start flashing when it is about to respawn.

Controls:

- Move: Arrow Keys (L-Stick or D-Pad for Xbox controller)

- Jump/Double Jump: Space (A Button for Xbox controller)

- Pick-Up-Key: Down Arrow (Down on L-Stick or D-Pad for Xbox controller)

- Throw Key: Control (X Button for Xbox controller)

- Depending on what direction you are pressing, determines how you throw the key.

I do hope you all enjoy this as much as I enjoyed making it. After the game jam has concluded, I will start work on completing this game. I have lots planned for it, and this demo is just a tiny taste of what I have in store.
